metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5706 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
js/get_scripts.js.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.16, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.7, and 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a large array in the scripts parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-5706` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
